entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then periods of light snow beginning after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 21 April 2023
